welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Haiku-Pauwela, a charming town known for its beautiful beaches, lush greenery, and laid-back atmosphere. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our little piece of paradise has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kahului Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Inter-Island Terminal
terminals.description: The inter-island terminal at Kahului Airport serves flights between the Hawaiian Islands.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hana Airport serves all domestic flights to and from the island of Maui.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kapalua West Maui Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.
